Undergraduate in Information Sciences at UIUC

2020 — present

I began UIUC as an undeclared student. My freshman year pretty restricvive cause of COVID, but I made the most of it. I joined the marcing Illini and made plenty of friends my sophomore year, though. During my major search, I hit a dead end. That is, until my roommate told me about iSchool. I looked into it and found a real place here. I wouldn't have done it any other way. I love where I am now and am planning on coming back to get my Master's next year.
